name: speakingtwist
0:
”Alexa, open speaking twist.”
”Alexa, spin the wheel.”
”Alexa, where is everyone at?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speaking twist
des: Have you played Twister before without someone to spin the wheel? Now that's fixed! This will not only spins the wheel for you but makes sure it doesn't land on a place that you're already at. This is two players and you can figure out where everybody is at by saying, "Alexa, where is everyone at?"
